title: Rugby-bu Joshi Manager Kakumei: Nazuna no Onegai!!
original_name: ラグビー部女子マネ革命 なづなのお願いっ!!
sinopse:
Torideyama Private High School once had a preeminent rugby program. Now the rugby team is made up of nothing but losers, but one high-school girl, Nazuna, is turning that team around! Here's a teenage sports series to root for!

(Source: Young Animal Arashi website)
